title: Drupal security advisory (AV26-175)
description: On February 25, 2026, Drupal published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Theme Negotiation by Rules  versions prior to 1.2.1
Anti-Spam by CleanTalk  versions prior to 9.7.0
CAPTCHA  versions prior to 1.17.0, version 2.0.0 to versions prior to 2.0.10
SAML SSO - Service Provider  versions prior to 3.1.3
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
